						                    Recurrent Childhood Ependymoma
						                    Treatment of recurrent childhood ependymoma may include the following:         -  Surgery.     -  Radiation therapy, which may include stereotactic radiosurgery, intensity-modulated radiation therapy, or proton-beam radiation therapy.    -  Chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of a new treatment.
